experience.position: Machine Learning and Data Engineering Intern
description: Extracting key insights from conversation transcripts. Streamlining and securing video processing infrastructure.
Designed an LLM-based assistant to convert language to database queries, accelerating data search times by 10x.
Created an app to send advertiser leads to sales managers through Slack, improving lead retrieval for 1000+ people.
Refactored frontend and backend components, decreasing time to develop and deploy form-based services by 50%.
Implemented an LLM test bench, enabling evaluation of 10+ LLMs for qualitative analysis of health science documents.
Led development of a software profiling pipeline for analyzing the performance of CNNs running on Snapdragon.
Increased speed of analysis tools by 500+%. Added reduction methods to accelerate preprocessing of large datasets.
Designed a querying system and cache for large performance datasets (50k+ points), removing dataset size limitation.
Designed and implemented a time-based search engine to enable nanosecond-level analysis of CNN execution.
Optimized Inter-Process Communication (IPC) for an embedded framework that accelerates image processing.
Added runtime configuration for embedded debugging infrastructure, increasing debug speed for 40+ engineers.
Created and deployed an Extract-Load-Transform (ELT) pipeline to analyze processor performance on AI workloads.
Integrated data transmission features into production code, wrote tests to verify thread-safety and scalability.
Used a data-driven approach to evaluate and improve the performance of Inter-Process Communication (IPC) by 50%.
Enabled measurement collection for 5+ embedded AI-based image processing use cases on Snapdragon.
Implemented, A/B tested, and deployed an ML model to recommend code reviewers for pull requests, for 3600+ users.
Optimized Natural Language Processing (NLP) pipelines for customer service chatbots, increasing accuracy to 99%.
Reduced the customer service chatbot's Docker image size and memory use by 90+%, saving $35,000+/year.
Created RESTful APIs to convert chatbot responses to HTML and JSON, accelerating UI/UX development by 2x.
Developed a Recurrent Neural Network (RNN)-based model to detect anomalies in router telemetry data.
Wrote automated unit tests for 5+ SRv6 features, ensuring correctness and scalability across network topologies
Constructed RESTful APIs to collect and preprocess 60+ SRv6 telemetry metrics using YANG.
Automated the configuration and simluation of router topologies and simulations for test scenarios.
Designed a deep reinforcement learning model to trade stocks using sentiment analysis and price predictions.
Reading group lead: presented papers on neural networks, image processing, and NLP to 100+ club members.
VP of Data analysis: hosted workshops on ML and AI basics, led a team of 5 analysts producing educational content.
Prepared resources and hosted workshops on Pandas, Numpy, MatPlotLib, and Tensorflow for 100+ members.
Fine-tuned a distillBERT LLM to retrieve 10+ metrics from climate disclosure extracts, for Manifest Climate.
Developed the TOHacks landing page using React.js. Built frontend website features used by 10,000+ visitors.
Developed a mock Banking System to teach financial practices to kids, in under 36 hours.
